sense.def: Illness Sign of jing 痙 , spasms, with the special characteristic of muscle stiffness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 3: 四石湯，治產後卒中風，發疾口噤瘛瘲，悶滿不知人，並緩急諸風毒 痹，身體痙強，及挾胎中風，婦人百病方 , “The recipe with four minerals cures sudden wind stroke following delivery, with an immediate appearance of clenched jaw, clonic spasms, heart-pressure, a feeling of fullness and an inability to recognize people, as well as all types of more or less severe blockages brought forth by wind poison, and spasms with stiffness affecting the entire body, wind stroke affecting the fetus and the one hundred diseases of women”.
